title: Syrian rebels agree deal to leave Ghouta
text:
Syrian rebels agree deal to leave Ghouta 6:06pm GMT - 01:14 
A Syrian rebel group has agreed to evacuate the part of eastern Ghouta under its control, which piles pressure on the remaining opposition forces in their last bastion near the capital to do the same. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Syrian rebel group has agreed to evacuate the part of eastern Ghouta under its control, which piles pressure on the remaining opposition forces in their last bastion near the capital to do the same.
